body: ### Welcome to Erlang Measurements. This application contains useful functions to convert values from one measurement/metric to another. Available conversions are currency, metric/imperial and temperature. The application uses a table to convert where applicable and if you add more measurements to the table please send me a pull request. ### Documentation Check out the code documentation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Erlang-measurements
